author: jameshe5018
content: Question, for the blocks event stream, do all clients stream blocks regardless if it was processed successfully or not? or only when it's successful

author: nflaig
content:
there are two different block events
```js
  /** The node has received a block (from P2P or API) that is successfully imported on the fork-choice `on_block` handler */
  block = "block",
  /** The node has received a block (from P2P or API) that passes validation rules of the `beacon_block` topic */
  blockGossip = "block_gossip",
```
